duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive a service culture through engaging, efficient, and personalized experiences, and interpret Voice of the customer feedback.
Act as a brand representative, partner with Visual Merchandising Manager to create an engaging visual experience, and deliver a seamless, omni channel shopping experience.
Actively participate as the floor service leader, guide the team to prioritize customer experience, and facilitate onboarding for new hires.
Support store management team in daily office procedures, shipment processing, and maintaining visual/display standards; adhere to store’s safety standards and inventory accuracy.
Contribute to an inclusive environment, facilitate the sharing of product knowledge, and communicate feedback to Visual Merchandising Manager and Store Manager.
Protect time to discuss personal growth with direct reports, set goals, and deliver feedback; invest time into ensuring the success of all team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management or related field (Master's preferred)
